metadata.name: HEIR of THUNDER Passcard
metadata.description: Colorful has officially launched its first NFT - 'Heir of Thunder' series Passcard, featuring the avatar on the front and the 'ingenuity（将心独具)' logo on the back.'Heir of Thunder' is a pass to the Colorful Web 3.0 and Metaverse community. Holders can unlock both on and offline utilities.and holders will be able to enjoyofficial benefits, so stay tuned!
